about.name: Jaeung Kim
about.intro: I'm a frontend developer who enjoys crafting smooth and intuitive user experiences.
about.description1: I love tackling challenges in the development process, the sense of accomplishment from solving problems keeps me motivated and helps me grow.
about.description2: Outside of work, I enjoy playing basketball and spending time in nature on the weekends.
about.description3: This space is my personal playground where I experiment with ideas I’ve been curious about, and also a place to jot down pieces of my everyday life.

introduce.paragraph1: Hello, I’m a frontend developer experienced in all stages of building web services, from planning and architecture to development, deployment, and maintenance. I’ve continuously grown by engaging deeply throughout the entire process.
introduce.paragraph2: I prioritize writing clear and understandable code that anyone can easily maintain, always striving for robust and efficient solutions. I am constantly learning and improving, driven by the goal of reaching the highest levels in frontend development.
introduce.paragraph3: I’m a Canadian citizen currently living in Korea on an F-4 visa. I strongly believe communication is essential for growth as a developer and actively engage in technical discussions with colleagues and participate in community activities to learn and grow together.

details: Designed and improved frontend architecture focusing on productivity and scalability
Improved team technical standards and promoted knowledge sharing through regular code reviews and tech sessions
Established stable and rapid deployment processes by improving CI/CD pipelines
Conducted technical demos for global partners and actively participated in external tech seminars and conferences

ndxpro_pmis.title: NDXPRO PMIS
ndxpro_pmis.description: Web solution for integrated project management

gantt_chart.title: WBS based Gantt Chart Development
subtasks: Designed and implemented a custom Gantt chart architecture to visualize complex project data
Implemented real time editing of task structure and schedules using drag and drop interactions with optimistic UI
Optimized rendering performance for thousands of tasks using virtualization and lazy loading, improving DOM rendering performance by 40%

document_system.title: Document Management System
subtasks: Architected and implemented a recursive folder navigation system
Developed custom hooks for keyboard based range and multi selection
Integrated file uploading and version management systems
Implemented a step by step feedback UI for document upload and version history

ndxpro_epc.title: NDXPRO EPC
ndxpro_epc.description: Web solution integrating design, procurement, and construction data across 1D, 2D, and 3D visualizations

viewer_markup.title: 2D Drawing Viewer and Markup Tools
subtasks: Built SVG based 2D viewer with interactive zoom and markup functionalities, maintaining accurate positions and scales
Provided markup tools (text, lines, curves) for intuitive editing within drawings
Optimized drawing editing workflow through efficient markup interactions

dashboard_layout.title: Customizable Grid Layout Dashboard
subtasks: Designed and implemented dynamic dashboard layouts using a customized React Grid Layout
Integrated communication with external partners’ 3D viewers through iframe and postMessage API

ndxpro_admin_web.title: NDXPRO ADMIN WEB
ndxpro_admin_web.description: Core NDXPRO platform for managing and modeling NGSI LD based digital twin data

data_manager.title: Data Manager V3 Development and Enhancement
subtasks: Developed and managed creation of Attributes, Data Models, and Relationships based on NGSI LD standards
Visualized data models and relationships intuitively using React Flow
Implemented efficient batch data management through Excel import/export features with client side validation

user_auth.title: Authentication and User Management Improvements
subtasks: Refactored legacy login and signup code, enhancing stability and maintainability of authentication processes
Optimized token refresh and session management using Axios Interceptors

samsung_thync.title: Samsung Thync
samsung_thync.description: Web based admin system integrated into Samsung BEMS Unreal app for user and asset management

nextjs_frontend.title: Unreal Integration and User Management System
subtasks: Designed authentication workflows supporting both SSO and standard logins
Implemented automatic user registration and permission approval processes on first login
Built login, registration, and permission management APIs using NestJS due to backend resource constraints

details: First developer at a unified clothing marketplace startup, responsible for frontend planning, development, and deployment
Developed a robust ecommerce platform integrated with multiple Shopify marketplaces
Enhanced platform security and accessibility using Supabase and third party login integrations (Instagram, TikTok)
Integrated Shopify Payments to reduce cart abandonment and improve transaction success rates
Built and maintained a modern, interactive marketing site using WebGL
Implemented engaging UI animations and interactions using Framer Motion and GSAP
Designed and operated an intuitive internal workforce management portal accessible to nontechnical stakeholders
Managed backend implementation, AWS infrastructure, NoSQL databases, and CI/CD pipelines
Strengthened technical foundations by designing React component architecture
Integrated third party systems enabling credit card cryptocurrency purchases
Built social media URL preview functionality using AWS Lambda@Edge and Facebook Open Graph
Collaborated with designers to significantly improve overall UI/UX

react-gantt-chart.title: React Gantt Chart
description: Open-source alternative to paid or inflexible Gantt chart solutions
Lightweight, extensible design for personal and professional use
Continuously improved based on community feedback

portfolio-website.title: Portfolio Website
description: Centralizes personal projects and articles in one place
Incorporates latest trends in frontend development with fully responsive experience
Prioritizes intuitive structure, clean design, and performance optimization

bc-government.title: BC Government
description: Created for the BC government’s IS24 Full Stack Competition
Offers a user-friendly interface for managing employees and teams
Built with a full-stack approach and deployed via Docker

lostark-bot.title: Lost Ark Discord Bot
description: Simplifies party and raid recruitment on Discord
Allows quick party creation and management through simple commands
Enhanced and maintained with community feedback

webgl-playground.title: WebGL Playground
description: Experimental 3D interaction project for the web
Features 3D scenes responsive to user input and various visual effects

lental.title: Lental
description: Housing search platform for UBC students
Developed as a capstone project to tackle off-campus housing challenges
Supports student-listed properties with an intuitive UI and filtering
